name: Air Cutter
description: You create a gust of razor-like wind to slash a creature. Make a ranged attack against a creature, doing 1d10 + MOVE flying damage on a hit. This move scores a critical hit on 19 and 20.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
